channel.title: entertainment on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in entertainment on FinanClub

item.title: DIS
item.description: score:295 Chances: The Walt Disney Co. continues to expand its ad-based streaming services, showing significant growth potential in the streaming market. The company’s shares saw a decent share price growth, indicating positive investor sentiment. Activist hedge fund Blackwells Capital solicited support for its nominees to Walt Disney’s board of directors, potentially leading to changes in the company’s management and strategy.

item.title: EDR
item.description: score:158 Chances: Endeavor Group Holdings Inc. has shown growth potential through its innovative rights deals and exclusive live events in the Owned Sports Properties segment. The company’s Events, Experiences & Rights segment owns and operates several successful events, including the Miami Open and New York Fashion Week.
